rooms.name: Entrance Hallway
rooms.description: A welcoming corridor with natural lighting and energy-efficient LED fixtures.

rooms.name: Living Room & Open-Plan Kitchen
rooms.description: An open-plan area merging the living space with a modern eco-friendly kitchen using sustainable materials and appliances. The layout ensures natural light from large windows.

rooms.name: Home Theatre
rooms.description: A dedicated home theatre with energy-efficient audio-visual equipment and insulation for optimal acoustics.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom
rooms.description: A comfortable guest bedroom designed to maximize natural light and ventilation, with a balcony attached for outdoor relaxation.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: The master suite includes a spacious balcony adhering to Vastu principles to enhance positive energy flow and natural light.

rooms.name: Second Bedroom
rooms.description: A bedroom with an attached balcony for private outdoor space.

rooms.name: Third Bedroom
rooms.description: Another bedroom designed with a balcony to ensure ample natural light and fresh air.

openings.name: Main Entrance Door
openings.description: An energy-efficient door with proper insulation and aesthetics.

openings.name: Living Room Windows
openings.description: Double-glazed windows ensuring thermal comfort and natural light penetration.

openings.name: Kitchen Windows
openings.description: Windows designed for proper ventilation and minimal heat build-up.

openings.name: Home Theatre Skylight
openings.description: Skylight installed for additional natural light and a pleasing ambiance.
